name: Alexander Kid (FanGame)
description:
ALEXANDER (ALÊ) KID | FAN-GAME)

[ How to Play ]

  • Arrow Keys or D-pad (Left, Right) to Move.
  • Arrow Key (Up) or D-Pad (A) to Jump.
  • Collect 5 moneybags to enter the Ramen Shop.
  • You lose when the time's out.
  • Enter Full-Screen Mode and Enable GPU Acceleration on your Browser for Best Experience

This is a fan-made project based on Alex Kidd in the Miracle World; all rights belong to Sega Corp;

Music by: Tokuhiko Uwabo

Created by: DADO (dadotronic) ALMEIDA
